title: Astro Glass Features
subtitle: Everything you need to build high-end, immersive digital experiences.
luxuryTitle: What do you want to build?
luxurySubtitle: Select your goal and see how Astro Glass helps you get there faster.
minimalCtaDesc: Start building with the complete Astro Glass toolkit today.
f1Desc: Zero-JS by default architecture ensures your site loads in the blink of an eye.
f1LongDesc: Built on Astro 5.0's island architecture, only the JavaScript you need is shipped. This means sub-second load times and perfect Core Web Vitals scores out of the box.
f2Desc: Multi-layered blur and refraction effects for a truly premium aesthetic.
f2LongDesc: Our glassmorphism system uses carefully calibrated backdrop filters, layered transparencies, and subtle gradients to create depth without sacrificing performance.
f3Desc: Every component responds gracefully to any screen size or orientation.
f3LongDesc: Mobile-first responsive design with fluid typography, adaptive spacing, and context-aware layouts that work beautifully from watch to ultrawide.
f4Desc: 10+ color palettes or create your own signature look in seconds.
f4LongDesc: Powered by CSS custom properties and DaisyUI, switch themes instantly or create custom palettes. Dark mode, light mode, and everything in between.
f5Desc: Deploy globally with Cloudflare Workers for instant access anywhere.
